TradingView Alerts

TradingView alerts are customizable notifications that inform traders and investors about specific market conditions, such as price movements, technical indicator triggers, or trend reversals. These alerts are highly versatile, offering options like pop-up messages, emails, push notifications, or webhooks for automation. They are ideal for staying updated without constantly monitoring the market, enabling users to act quickly on trading opportunities or risk management strategies in real-time.

Strategies Alerts

Each strategy will come with a minimum of four built-in alerts, designed for both entry and exit signals. These alerts serve the dual purpose of keeping you informed about every action the strategy takes and enabling automation if you wish to implement alert-based automation.

Write Alerts

Alert messages can be fully customized with any text, including emojis, to suit your preferences. To include dynamic values, placeholders can be used to fetch real-time information from the chart or strategy.
